name: RE: Join us for the Copilot Partner Bootcamp | September 19-21
content:
Hi Bijjala,

I have sent out the details to the following Team Leaders and CC to their
respective practice heads. Have requested to send me the list of people who have
registered from their teams.

 

 

Kunzang Dolma

Alagu Karmegam Kannan

 Pramod BS (BDC) SP

Hi @Tamilselvam Tamiliniyan [Tamiliniyan.T@totalebizsolutions.com], @Ramesh
Meyyappan [Ramesh.My@totalebizsolutions.com], @Vikas Anand
[Vikas.A@totalebizsolutions.com], @Rajesh Munivenkatraman
[Rajesh.M@totalebizsolutions.com], @Senthil P
[Senthilarasu.P@totalebizsolutions.com]

Please have a word with your leaders to encourage them on our direction
regarding the Copilot usage and the expectations. This will help them identify
the right people to attend this event and also following up with granting them
with access to co-pilot.

 

I will also be sharing the expectation and the plan regarding Copilot during our
TechConnect event this Friday.

 

Thank you!

 

Warm Regards,

Arunkumar.A

+65 9380 1343

From: Karine Lim
Sent: Monday, August 21, 2023 4:39 PM
To: Singh Neha <neha.singh@totalebizsolutions.com>; Amit Pradhan
<Amit.Pradhan@microsoft.com>; Karthickrajan Ramadass
<karthickrajan.r@totalebizsolutions.com>
Cc: Bryan Pang <Bryan.Pang@microsoft.com>
Subject: Join us for the Copilot Partner Bootcamp | September 19-21

 

Dear Partner,

As your PDM, I wanted to invite you to join the Microsoft Copilot Partner
Bootcamp, taking place September 19-21 in the Pacific time zone and September
20-22 in the London and India time zones. The Microsoft Copilot Partner
Bootcamp is a multi-day event addressing the new era of AI across the Microsoft
Cloud. We will help demystify AI and Copilot by covering the narrative, customer
conversations, and technical requirements across each Copilot solution. Join us
to discover how to make the most out of this opportunity and get your customers
ready for copilot.

See below for more details and to register!

Regards,

Karine Lim

[cid:image001.png@01D9D679.90AB90D0]

 

 

Microsoft Copilot Partner Bootcamp
[cid:image002.png@01D9D679.90AB90D0][cid:image003.png@01D9D679.90AB90D0]

 

September 19-21 | 9:00 AM – 10:30 AM Pacific Daylight Time

September 20-22 | 9:00 AM – 10:30 AM London & India Standard Time

The Copilot Bootcamp is a multi-day partner event addressing the new era of AI
across the Microsoft Cloud. Join this bootcamp, open to all role types, to learn
more about our AI capabilities from both business and technical aspects, with an
overview of each Microsoft Copilot solution.

We will help demystify AI and Copilot by covering the narrative, customer
conversations, and technical requirements to take advantage of the AI
opportunity. Join us to discover how to make the most out of this opportunity
and get your customers ready for copilot.

Register today [https://aka.ms/AICopilotBootcamp]

 

What will this event cover?

During this multi-day training, you will be able to learn about:

 * What Azure OpenAI and Copilot are and their capabilities
 * Understanding the AI and Copilot narrative and customer conversation
 * Customer technical requirements to adopt the various Copilots
 * How Copilot is licensed
 * Leveraging Copilot to accelerate Dynamics, M365, and Power Platform sales
 * Privacy, security, and compliance

 

 

Who is this event for?

The Copilot Bootcamp is ideal for anyone looking to better understand how to
approach Microsoft’s AI and Copilot conversations from a sales and technical
perspective. This virtual boot camp is open to: 

 * All role types from Executives to Sellers to Architects
 * Anyone looking to understand Microsoft’s AI capabilities across all areas and
   incorporate it into their customer conversations and projects 
 * Anyone experienced in role, but new to Microsoft + AI

 

When is this event offered?

This event is offered in Pacific Time (UTC-8) and Indian Standard Time
(UTC+5:30)

Register today [https://aka.ms/AICopilotBootcamp]

 

If you prefer I not forward you these types of communications, just let me know.
